p: Resveratrol is a natural phytoalexin, included in the family of stilbenes [ 35, 123]. Various plants synthesize it in the presence of ultraviolet radiations. Wine, grapes, stilbenes, and berries represent the most common sources of resveratrol [ 124]. Resveratrol possesses various beneficial therapeutic effects, such as anti-inflammatory, anti-angiogenic, anti-oxidative and anti-neoplastic properties [ 125].
